title: New: Lapalux – Guuurl
body: Not that the **[Lapalux](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18824-new-gucci-mane-stupid-lapalux-bootleg/ "New: Gucci Mane – Stupid (Lapalux Bootleg)")** remix of **Gucci Mane**’s ‘_Stupid_’ wasn’t thoroughly appreciated, but I’m pretty sure we’ll all agree, new, slightly more serious work, from the young producer was very much wanted. Today we got it, the first cut from the debut album, due to drop Via **Brainfeeder** in March. It’s a squelchy little number, every sound is think and fuzzy, allowing textures to sink in, drift off and run away with you. Excitement is brewing for the album.
